About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a skilled software enginner. I am an experienced front end developer. I have working knowledge in backend development and in cloud computing. Excited to learn everyday

Front end developer

Intermediate

Creating the user-facing part of websites and web applications, ensuring they are visually appealing, responsive, and function smoothly. Skillful in HTML,CSS,Javascript,git, and bootstrap.

UI/UX designer

Intermediate

Focused on the design and user experience aspects of digital products, ensuring they are both visually appealing and easy to use. Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe and Figma. Skillful in visual and interaction design.

Cloud architect

Basic

Basic skills and knowledge in programming and scripting languages commonly used in cloud environments, AWS , database management and cloud security.
